Bandage.description: A clean strip of cloth used to wrap small wounds. Restores 2 HP when used.

Healing Potion.description: A small glass vial of glowing red liquid. Restores 5 HP when consumed.

Gold Coin.description: A shiny gold coin. Valuable in most towns.

Beer Keg.description: A heavy wooden keg filled with the tavernâ€™s best ale. Return it to complete the tavern quest.

Iron Sword.description: A sturdy iron sword. Reliable and sharp, useful in close combat.

Wooden Sword.description: A basic wooden sword. Not very effective, but better than nothing.

Dagger.description: A small blade favored by rogues and goblins alike. Good for quick attacks.

Crude Spear.description: A small bended spear often used by goblins. Can be thrown or used as a melee weapon.

Torch.description: A simple torch that lights up dark areas. Burns for several turns before going out.

Old Map.description: An old crude map that seems to lead somewhere. It might be useful for navigation.

Shield.description: A wooden shield reinforced with iron bands. Reduces incoming damage in battle.

Tower Shield.description: Iron shield with checkered pattern. Greatly reduces incoming damage in battle.

Greater Healing Potion.description: A rare golden tonic that revitalizes the drinker. Restores 10 HP.

Lockpick.description: A simple metal pick used to open locked chests or doors.

Goblin Ear.description: A trophy from a fallen goblin warrior. Proof of victory and a grim collectible.

Healing Herbs.description: A soothing ointment made from forest herbs. Restores 3 HP when applied.
